üë©üèΩ‚ÄçüöÄ Projects

Resume Website

    Created this website utilizing Javascript, ThreeJS, CSS and HTML

Azure DevOps Meeting Ender

    Created a python program that utilizes the Azure DevOps API. The program goes through the whole teams work items and singles out only work items that contain certain meeting code words. It will then close out any meetings that are older than 5 days. This program is put in Azure function and with a timer trigger it is set to run weekly. This helped the cloud transformation team keep their azure devops work items clean and free of any old items.

DevOps Work Items Of Age Reminder

    Python program that analyses each team members work items. This program utilizes the Azure API and Gmail API. If the program notices that a work item has been left untouched for 30 days it will create an email script and send an email out to that member, reminding them to update/close that work item. This program is place in an Azure function and a timer trigger is set up to have it run daily at 8am.

Azure Query Migration:

    Created a PowerShell script to help company transition from one Azure DevOps Organization to another specifically the migration of queries. Essentially this program goes through one organization queries and pastes them into the new organization.

Sales Cloud Projects

  • Created reference architecture diagrams to help companies easily see the differences between Azure and AWS, including basic pricing differences. This was done for each Windows and Linux versions. This is something that the sales team would utilize to show potential customers.
  • Created price estimates for companies planning to migrate to the cloud, these price estimates were done in both AWS and Azure
